distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for dovecot22 fixes the following issues:

  - insecure SSL/TLS key and certificate file creation (CVE-2016-4983) (bnc #984639)
  - Fix LDAP based authentication for some setups (boo #1003952)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A postinstall script in the dovecot rpm allows local users to read the contents of newly created SSL/TLS key files.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

fixed: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1:dovecot22-2.2.13-4.1.ppc64le
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1:dovecot22-2.2.13-4.1.s390x
